event.title: Grant Proposal Writing
event.description: What is a grant essay? When you are writing a grant proposal, you are expected to provide a piece of writing that is argumentative and persuasive in nature and that provides your in-depth knowledge in a specific realm of studies or a concrete subject area still worth investigation. Grant writing is overall serious as it should be both interesting and informative in content and be able to convince the grant admission committee that your project is worth their consideration.
